narrative.title: 2Nd South African Division - 1942Q2
narrative.situation: British Commonwealth Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q2.
narrative.objectives: Commonwealth infantry division organized on British model. Stationed in Tobruk fortress during Battle of Gazala (May-June 1942). Division less one brigade (3rd SA Brigade was not at Tobruk). Tasked with fortress defense during Rommel's offensive. Relatively inexperienced - only prior combat was capture of Bardia six months earlier.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: coastal plain and rocky desert (Tobruk fortress perimeter)
